cgcloud__User_Document_Template__c.name: cgcloud__User_Document_Template__c
cgcloud__User_Document_Template__c.description: Stores the details of the daily report template, which is to be used for daily reports.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Check_Activity_Duration__c.description: Validation for the system to consider maximum activity duration.

cgcloud__Creation_Platform__c.description: Indicates the platform that can be used to create the user document that references this template.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Max_Activity_Duration__c.description: Maximum activity duration that the user document referencing this template can have.

cgcloud__Mobility_Relevant__c.description: Controls the validation of restrictions that are necessary for usage on mobility devices.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Position of this instance in overviews or toggles.

cgcloud__Workflow__c.description: Reference to the workflow that's to be used by the corresponding user document report.
